inventoryOverview.lastUpdated: Date of the Last update of stocks

count.productsOutOfStock: Number of products out of Stock
count.productsLowStock: Number of products low in stock (below a given limit set in settings)
count.productsNearExpiry: Number of products about to be expired (before N days set in settings)

names: Array of names of types (Of only available products) (Descending order)
counts: Array of products available in corresponding types (Descending order)

financial.cost: Total selling price of the entire inventory
financial.profitProductCount: Number of products being sold more than the wholesale price
financial.profitPercent: If selling price is more than wholesale, calculate profit amount
financial.lossProductCount: Number of products being sold less than the wholesale price
financial.lossPercent: If selling price is less than wholesale, calculate loss amount
financial.sameAsWholesaleAmount: Number of products having same wholesale and selling
